tags: l i s t e n
i have a lot of feels about tony okay
protect tony stark at all costs
summary: Rewatching the first Ironman, and I'm sure this has been said but. How much of Tony's change was because of Yinsen. Yes, of...
body: Rewatching the first Ironman, and I’m sure this has been said but. How much of Tony’s change was because of Yinsen. Yes, of course seeing his weapons being used against them was a huge part. But. Yinsen telling him “Don’t waste it, don’t waste it.” As he dies. I feel that stayed very close to him, and it’s something he never shares with anyone. And it becomes a driving force, not to waste his skills, to help as much as he can.

reblog.comment: Rewatching the first Ironman, and I’m sure this has been said but. How much of Tony’s change was because of Yinsen. Yes, of course seeing his weapons being used against them was a huge part. But. Yinsen telling him “Don’t waste it, don’t waste it.” As he dies. I feel that stayed very close to him, and it’s something he never shares with anyone. And it becomes a driving force, not to waste his skills, to help as much as he can.

trail.content_raw: Rewatching the first Ironman, and I’m sure this has been said but. How much of Tony’s change was because of Yinsen. Yes, of course seeing his weapons being used against them was a huge part. But. Yinsen telling him “Don’t waste it, don’t waste it.” As he dies. I feel that stayed very close to him, and it’s something he never shares with anyone. And it becomes a driving force, not to waste his skills, to help as much as he can.
trail.content: Rewatching the first Ironman, and I’m sure this has been said but. How much of Tony’s change was because of Yinsen. Yes, of course seeing his weapons being used against them was a huge part. But. Yinsen telling him “Don’t waste it, don’t waste it.” As he dies. I feel that stayed very close to him, and it’s something he never shares with anyone. And it becomes a driving force, not to waste his skills, to help as much as he can.

summary: Okay, but like imagine Tony talking to May and then he invites her and Peter over for dinner the next day to which May replies...
question: Okay, but like imagine Tony talking to May and then he invites her and Peter over for dinner the next day to which May replies that she’s going to Peter’s talent show to Tony’s confusion and he realises that Peter never mentioned to him that MJ dared him to enter bc he thought Tony had more important things to do so tony goes anyway to surprise him and the moment he walks in he sees Peter dancing to ‘umbrella’. Needless to say Rhodey, Happy and Pepper were treated to 10000+ texts that night.
answer: Tony has the video saved so he can play it at Peter’s wedding one day after his “Proud Dad Speech.” He’s had it written for about 6 months now and it just keeps getting longer and longer XD

reblog.comment: Tony has the video saved so he can play it at Peter’s wedding one day after his “Proud Dad Speech.” He’s had it written for about 6 months now and it just keeps getting longer and longer XD

summary: Tony’s Daughter Imagines: Coming Out to Your Daughter (Stony)
title: Tony’s Daughter Imagines: Coming Out to Your Daughter (Stony)
body:
“What I’m trying to tell is that … . Steve and I are together. We’re dating. I’m dating a man.”

“Dad, I know. I saw you two making out a couple of days ago in the living room. I’m surprised your tongue didn’t pop out of Steve’s ear.”

“So what do you think? You cool with it?”

“Yeah, I’m cool with it. You’re still my dad and I love you even if you’re french kissing Captain America on the couch.”

Bonus:

“So you know about me and Tony now?”

“Yes, I do, and I fully support it, but here this, Rogers. If you ever hurt my dad, I’m gonna be the last person you see before you learn how to walk again.”

“I believe you.”

reblog.comment:

body:
The Avengers, sitting down at the table during thanksgiving;

Tony: Peter, would you lead us in giving grace?


Peter: *smiles* Sure. Yeet, let us eat.

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Beaten in Lips
title: Beaten in Lips
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Iopvuj

by literally_no_idea

When Peggy first walks in on Howard berating his son, she’s understandably shocked. She initially wonders why Jarvis had allowed her to come back here in the first place, but when she thinks about it, she understands. Jarvis, by nature of working for Howard, can’t really say or do anything to help Tony. But for Peggy, who’s a close friend but not an employee of Howard’s, she can do what’s necessary.

–

title comes from the Beartooth song of the same name.

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Edward Iron
title: Edward Iron
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2BFgG9E

by Fighting_for_creativity

Playing on all sides was tiredsome.

All boring dull and mostly unrewarding work.

There is no exception to that rule.

Except, Tony’s true colours were the reason he found his lover.
So maybe at least something good came out of it.
